name: Javes
description: Javes is a Telegram userbot that running on Python , It help you to manage your telegram easily

TELEGRAM_STRING_SESSION.description: Get this value by running [python3 string_session.py] in Termux or heroku[IMPORTANT]

HEROKU_APIKEY.description: very important for !update command to make javes up-to-date , get it from 'https://dashboard.heroku.com/account.

HEROKU_APPNAME.description: enter this app name agin here, very inportant for !update comand to make javes up-to-date ,

GENIUS_API_TOKEN.description: need for !lyrics comand , Get your own api token from https://genius.com/developers
GENIUS_API_TOKEN.value: Enter genius api here if you need

COUNTRY.description: Set your Country to be used in the !time and !date commands.

TZ_NUMBER.description: Change this value in case your country has multiple Time Zones.

CHROME_DRIVER.description: ChromeDriver location for selenium based modules.

GOOGLE_CHROME_BIN.description: Google Chrome (or) Chromium binary location for selenium based modules.

OPEN_WEATHER_MAP_APPID.value: Enter api here if you need

BOTLOG.description: Recommed to true ,BOTLOG_CHATID must be filled correct if you set it true

BOTLOG_CHATID.description: Important for wark some plugins,bot logs , make super group with @missrose_bot then type /id to get this value

CONSOLE_LOGGER_VERBOSE.description: BOTLOG_CHATID must be filled correct if you set it true

PM_PROTECTOR.description: Prevent unknown people to spam your pm , type !allow to allow them to pm

YOUTUBE_API_KEY.description: YouTube Data API Key for !youtube command. Get from https://console.cloud.google.com
YOUTUBE_API_KEY.value: Enter api here if you need

OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.description: OCR API Key for !read (read photo's text)command. Get from https://ocr.space/ocrapi
OCR_SPACE_API_KEY.value: Enter api here if you need

REM_BG_API_KEY.description: API Key for .rbg(remove background picture) command. Get from https://www.remove.bg/api
REM_BG_API_KEY.value: Enter api here if you need

ANTI_SPAMBOT.description: BOTLOG_CHATID must be filled correct if you set it true

ANTI_SPAMBOT_SHOUT.description: BOTLOG_CHATID must be filled correct if you set it true

CLEAN_WELCOME.description: When a new person joins, the old welcome message is deleted.

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID.description: Enter Your Client ID for Google Drive.
G_DRIVE_CLIENT_ID.value: Enter vlaue here if you need

LASTFM_API.description: API Key for Last.FM module. [Get one from - https://www.last.fm/api/account/create].
LASTFM_API.value: Enter api here if you need

LASTFM_SECRET.description: SECRET Key for Last.FM module. [Get one from - https://www.last.fm/api/account/create].
LASTFM_SECRET.value: Enter vlaue here if you need

BIO_MESSAGE.description: custom bio message while u using !autobio command

PM_MESSAGE.description: you can edit what pm_protecter message!
PM_MESSAGE.value: Hello Sir, I can't allow you to my master's PM without his permissions please be patient, Thankyou

SUDO_USERS.description: give sudo user's id , he can controll your javes like groupmanaging bots!!

AFK_MESSAGE.value: Hello Sir, My master offline just leave your message, Thankyou!

BLOCK_MESSAGE.value: I am not going to allow you to spam My master's PM, You have been blocked!

DEFAULT_BIO.value: Hi there iam using Javes yoooo!

LYDIA_API_KEY.description: need for auto replay (lydia) future get api key from https://coffeehouse.intellivoid.net/

G_DRIVE_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Enter Your Client Secret for Google Drive.

G_DRIVE_AUTH_TOKEN_DATA.description: Enter the Google Drive authentication data, as a JSON structure.

WEATHER_DEFCITY.description: Set the default city for the userbot's !weather module.

LOGSPAMMER.description: BOTLOG_CHATID must be filled correct if you set it true
